rows.label: tev001101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh? Hey, [ST:playername ].
How are your division missions progressing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001101_MSG0002
rows.name:
If you don't object to my presence, I'd be happy to
join you for a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Of course, this is just a personal request, not an order
as your team leader. Don't feel obligated to comply.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001101_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: tev001101_SEL0011
rows.name: Add Elma to your team.

rows.label: tev001101_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001101_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline Elma's request for now.

rows.label: tev001101_MSG0004
rows.name: Thanks. I'm honored to serve on your team, [ST:gender p1=sir p2=ma'am ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001101_MSG0005
rows.name: I understand. Maybe some other time, then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001101_MSG0010
rows.name:
HQ is analyzing the data terminal now. I understand
your impatience, but these things do take time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Until the analysis is complete, we'll just have to pursue
our other BLADE duties. Maybe I could tag along while
you complete some missions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001101_JNK0150
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: tev001101_SEL0151
rows.name: Add Elma to your team.

rows.label: tev001101_JNK0160
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001101_SEL0161
rows.name: Decline Elma's request for now.

rows.label: tev001101_MSG0012
rows.name:
Great. Then let's be off. There's plenty of work that
needs doing, I'm sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001101_MSG0013
rows.name:
I understand. I'm willing to assist with any sort of
mission, so if you need me, don't hesitate to ask.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001101_MSG0018
rows.name:
Thank you, [ST:playername ].
Thank you for accepting me as a friend, even now
that you know my true nature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001101_MSG0019
rows.name:
If you ever need my assistance, please just ask.
Any time, any place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001101_JNK0170
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: tev001101_SEL0171
rows.name: Add Elma to your team.

rows.label: tev001101_JNK0180
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001101_SEL0181
rows.name: Decline Elma's request for now.

rows.label: tev001101_MSG0020
rows.name:
New LA is my home now. Let's do all we can to make
it a better place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001101_MSG0021
rows.name: I understand. Maybe some other time, then.[ST:wait ]
